column4: hello people, i want to install 3 linuxes on my netbook, but i'm having troubles finding the best way to partition all that
i heard i should create sda1 as the swap partition, i hear i should create an extended partition with a logical swap...
only linux on that netbook? then use all logical drives, 1 swap, 3 linux-/ and 1 big data-partition to be shared
there is no practical difference between logical/primary
